BR_text.BRsummary: TST Codecov isn't reporting coverage right
BR_text.BRdescription:
For example, it says that no lines in scattering1d.py are ever run:
 <denchmark-link:https://codecov.io/gh/kymatio/kymatio/src/master/kymatio/scattering1d/scattering1d.py>https://codecov.io/gh/kymatio/kymatio/src/master/kymatio/scattering1d/scattering1d.py</denchmark-link>
 
 In fact, the only code it claims runs are the test functions. Is there some issue with how we're importing the classes that are preventing the code from being registered as run?
